messages.messageBody:
>
>
>
> Has anyone bought the new Barbie that comes with a pregnant stomach and a
> little baby?
>
> I want one!! please mommy!! (I tried showing it to my 2 year old son-
> "isnt this cute!"- I am ignored...)
>
> (Hey, wait a minute!... I AM the mommy- !)
>
> Toys-r-Us here I come,
> Bronwen
>



> Our 3 yr. old has one she loves it. She was totally in awe when Nicholas was
> born and its kind cool cuz the belly is magnetic and I had a section. Too
> bad she doesn't look like I did after he was born, she is instantly skinny
> again. Eleven months later and going from 200 pounds to 140 I still have a
> pouch that will not go away. Barbie how did u do that? LOL


Laura
Maine

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Barbie- .
messages.msgSnippet: Has anyone bought the new Barbie that comes with a pregnant stomach and a little baby? I want one!!  please mommy!!  (I tried showing it to my 2 year old son-
messages.messageBody:
Has anyone bought the new Barbie that comes with a pregnant stomach and a
little baby?

I want one!! please mommy!! (I tried showing it to my 2 year old son-
"isnt this cute!"- I am ignored...)

(Hey, wait a minute!... I AM the mommy- !)

Toys-r-Us here I come,
Bronwen
